body_html: Note that you want the version from NVIDIA's apt repos rather than the (older) version in Ubuntu. Alternatively just set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH I mentioned above, because the library comes with CUDA.
body_text: Note that you want the version from NVIDIA's apt repos rather than the (older) version in Ubuntu. Alternatively just set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH I mentioned above, because the library comes with CUDA.
body: Note that you want the version from NVIDIA's apt repos rather than the (older) version in Ubuntu. Alternatively just set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH I mentioned above, because the library comes with CUDA.
